learning_objective: Recommend improvements to the design of computing devices, based on an analysis of how users interact with the devices.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is a game developer who has recently finished a first-person shooter game. The game was beta-tested and the players reported that the virtual reality (VR) elements were too intense and some even felt nausea. Which improvement can Alex make in the game's design to enhance user interaction and prevent this issue?",
    "Answer1": "Remove the VR elements and make it a traditional video game",
    "Answer2": "Add more challenging enemies and levels",
    "Answer3": "Add user-adjustable settings for VR intensity",
    "Answer4": "Redesign the game's color scheme",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "Providing user-adjustable settings for VR intensity allows the VR elements to be customized. This will therefore satisfy users who wish to have a less intense VR experience, thus improving user interaction."
}
